Portland.Southwest 6th & Pine Street and Southwes:
The Southwest 6th & Pine Street and Southwest 5th & Oak Street stations are light rail stations on the MAX Green, Orange and Yellow Lines in Portland, Oregon. It is the 3rd stop southbound on the Portland Transit Mall extension.
The stations are built into the sidewalks of 5th and 6th Avenues, with the 5th Avenue platform served by southbound trains and the 6th Avenue platform by northbound trains.
